13:25 <esu> is now known as <eshan>  
13:26 <eshan> hello devs, I am fresh graduate and looking forward some experience in java based project. I found this project while i was searching gsoc accepted org list in 2012.  Could you please help me and give some information regarding this  
13:43 <polx\_> has joined #xwiki  
13:48 <polx> has quit  
13:48 <polx\_> is now known as <polx>  
13:50 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
13:57 <vmassol> eshan: hi. What would you like to know?  
14:01 <eshan> vmassol : I have some hands on experiences in java,spring,hibernate,jquery etc. I would like to submit some patches and contribute to the project. I would like to know the procedure / how can i get initial step etc  
14:02 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
14:03 <gdelhumeau> eshan > you might begin by getting sources from github and try to build the wiki on your machine.  
14:18 <sdumitriu> has quit  
14:35 <eshan> has quit  
15:27 <polx> has quit  
15:28 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
15:45 <CIA-121> Vincent Massol master \* r125f480 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-commons/commit/125f48084f4c4aede7f48546231e4a34489b7ab7 / (2 files in 2 dirs): XCOMMONS-256: Converter Manager returns invalid result type when using the BeanUtils converters and no converter is found - http://git.io/qe6lQg  
15:45 <CIA-121> Vincent Massol master \* rf5a87b8 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-commons/commit/f5a87b8f9e6593c61ff03e5a7627139e967f8e0f / (2 files in 2 dirs): XCOMMONS-256: Converter Manager returns invalid result type when using the BeanUtils converters and no converter is found - http://git.io/DN6wWg  
15:56 <vmassol> jvdrean: hello. FYI I'm working on improving the user experience when using wiki component  
15:56 <vmassol> working on error messages  
15:57 <vmassol> I"ve fixed a bug in xwiki-properties as a result btw ;)  
15:57 <+jvdrean> vmassol: cool :)  
16:17 <vmassol> btw guys today is supposed to be release day  
16:17 <vmassol> ....  
16:18 <vmassol> jvdrean: I haven't seen any commit for UI extensions yet so it seems you're late  
16:18 <vmassol> mflore/tmortagne: what's your status re EM "upgrade farm in 5 minutes"?  
16:25 <polx> has quit  
16:30 <vmassol> mflorea: this code doesn't look too nice, I'm investigating:  
16:30 <vmassol>         try {  
16:30 <vmassol>             transformationManager.performTransformations(content, txContext);  
16:30 <vmassol>         } catch (Exception e) {  
16:31 <vmassol>             throw new RuntimeException(e);  
16:31 <vmassol>         }  
16:31 <vmassol> it's in DocumentContentDisplayer  
16:35 <vmassol> mflorea: it breaks the full rendering of the page  
16:35 <+mflorea> why?  
16:35 <vmassol> (for the content rendering part)  
16:35 <gdelhumeau> Hi people. I'm trying to build xwiki-platform from the git repository  
16:35 <gdelhumeau> I have this issue:  
16:35 <gdelhumeau>  Running org.xwiki.rendering.macro.formula.IntegrationTests  
16:35 <gdelhumeau> [16:14:55] Guillaume "Louis-Marie" Delhumeau: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: net/sourceforge/jeuclid/MutableLayoutContext  
16:35 <gdelhumeau> at org.xwiki.formula.internal.SnuggleTexFormulaRenderer.renderImage(SnuggleTexFormulaRenderer.java:74)  
16:36 <vmassol> because the runtime exception bubbles up  
16:36 <vmassol> mflorea: so for example I have one macro that's failing (voluntarily) and I get this:  
16:37 <vmassol> (sorry my internet connection is slow, watiign for upload)  
16:37 <+mflorea> and the transformation exception doesn't bubble up?  
16:37 <vmassol> it should be handled  
16:37 <vmassol> wait you'll see what I get  
16:37 <vmassol> which is really not nice for the user  
16:38 <vmassol> transforming a checked exception in a runtime exception has little chance of being right anway  
16:38 <vmassol> http://www.evernote.com/shard/s119/sh/1052ae1a-255f-477f-a226-5ef1b7db141a/6ba1636387bd82e3eea175ab412fd9ba  
16:38 <vmassol> so just a macro having a wrong execute() method implementation will get you this  
16:38 <+mflorea> ok, so the issue is not that I transform the exception type, but that I don't stop the exception  
16:39 <vmassol> I'm not sure yet how we should handle it properly, I haven't analyzed it yet  
16:39 <vmassol> all I know is that we can do better than what we're currently doing which is not nice  
16:42 <vmassol> ok I think I can fix my specific use case  
16:42 <vmassol> working on it  
16:49 <+mflorea> I see that the TransformationException is caught and stopped in other places, so yes, we should do the same in DocumentContentDisplayer.  
16:55 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
17:01 <vmassol> mflorea: fyi I was able to fix my problem for my specific use case  
17:02 <+mflorea> ok  
17:04 <evalica> has quit  
17:10 <Enygma`> has quit
